price: Wọ́n wí pé: “Dá òun àti arákùnrin rẹ̀ dúró ná, kí o sì rán àwọn akónijọ¹ sí àwọn ìlú
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبۡعَثۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ
footnotes: 1. Àwọn akójijọ ni àwọn alukoro rẹ̀, àwọn aláago atótó-arére.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-ib'ʿath fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
